title: Textile, "Le Jardin des Plantes", 1802–18
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave
inscribed: At one end; "FAVRE-PETITPIERRE & COMPe A NANTES BON TEINT" within box; "F.R." in red within box; and "CL" in grey.
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 80 x 86 cm (31 1/2 x 33 7/8 in.)
description: Design in red on white ground of a zoological park with fenced enclosures containing animals. People strolling. Chef de piece present at upper edge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Le Jardin des Plantes", 1802–18.
1802–18. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved copper plate on plain weave. Gift of Cora Ginsburg. 1994-80-14.
